testcaseName: Dose 1 to 2 at 8 weeks -5 days (#1 at 1 year)
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from invalid dose
generalDescription: This test case describes when a child greater than 12 months of age is administered a second dose of the Hib vaccine at an interval of 8 weeks - 5 days from the first dose that the dose is not valid.  Another dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange: Condensed the past due date to align with the earliest and recommended date since this child is in catch-up
